by.epam.admoffice.dao

Class AbstractDAO<E,F,U,S extends Entity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.epam.admoffice.dao.AbstractDAO<E,F,U,S>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - type of entrant object
    F - type of faculty object
    U - type of user object
    s - type of student object
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EntrantDAO, FacultyDAO, StudentDAO, UserDAO

    public abstract class AbstractDAO<E,F,U,S extends Entity>
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class gives base realization of CRUD operations using JDBC.
